page.title: 11MY BUSIEST DAY
page.content: { Ryton First School for 4 to 8 yr olds {gave this view of the village. My busiest day is Thursday. At 7:15 I get up and have a wash. I have cereal for breakfast then I get dressed. I get my swimming bag ready. At 8:40 I say goodbye to my mum and help to push Mrs Timm's baby up to school. We arrive in the playground at 8:50.At 9:05 the bell rings and we go into school. At 9:15 we go to Assembly, then we have hymn practice. We go back to our classroom to work. We have dinner at 12:00, sometimes it is very nice. We start work again at 1:00. Then at 2:30 we go swimming. We have to go to Ryton Police College to swim. We get back to school at 3:30, then I walk home. I have my tea then I go to my nan's until 6:30. I brush my dog then I brush my teeth and go to bed at 8:00. goodnight. {Lyndsey (age 7).
